The agriculture industry would see a significant decline, as the need for crops would no longer be necessary for survival.
The waste management industry would also see a decrease in demand, as the need for disposing of food waste would be greatly reduced.
The pharmaceutical industry might experience a shift in focus, as the need for drugs related to hunger and nutrition would decrease.
The fashion industry might experience a change in trends, as clothing styles that revolve around food and eating might no longer be relevant.
The concept of cooking and the culinary arts might still exist, but it would likely evolve into more of an art form and a hobby rather than a necessity.
